channel.title: Will anybody help me?
channel.description:
well ive decided to start makin games, i do webdev and making rsps but i havnt really made a game and i would love to make games for a future i want to be a game maker is the anyway anybody could give me links to get started and the best thinks to download for making games.
thankyou
---- Iedgey

item.title: Will anybody help me?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“iEdgey, post:1, topic:517580”]well ive decided to start makin games, i do webdev and making rsps but i havnt really made a game and i would love to make games for a future i want to be a game maker is the anyway anybody could give me links to get started and the best thinks to download for making games.

thankyou

---- Iedgey[/quote]

Well, what type of games?
Where do you want to go with them?
What software do you want to use?

Unity is great and free, but pro has a lot of features you may want (later on)

Read full topic
